name: Laka Ltd
description: Developer of a peer-to-peer bicycle insurance platform intended to protect bikes. The company's solution provides actual coverage by a community of like-minded people who are collectively given a fair price that covers theft, vandalism, damage, and loss as well as provides recovery advice and treatments, enabling users with a cost-effective and fairer insurance product.
one_liner: Developer of a peer-to-peer bicycle insurance platform intended to protect bikes. The company's solution provides actual coverage by a community of like-minded people who are collectively given a fair price that covers theft, vandalism, damage, and loss as well as provides recovery advice and treatments, enabling users with a cost-effective and fairer insurance product.
